Name: Shady Part of Me
About the game: Shady Part of Me sends you on an emotional and dream-like journey, with breathtaking artistic direction and the enthralling voice of Hannah Murray (Game of Thrones, Skins). As a little girl and her shadow, overcome emotional struggles through surreal dreamscapes across a touching narrative filled with twists and surprises. Both must learn, cooperate and evolve to progress in a poetic journey. Play with light and shadows, switching between 2D and 3D gameplay at will Your ability to rewind time will help you get you through all situations Explore surreal environments envisioned in a unique watercolor style Solve contemplative puzzles to break the dream Experience an introspective narrative journey like no other
